results.idea: Short-term momentum: recent 5-day returns z-scored
results.description: Uses momentum on rsk62_5_return. Applied SUGGESTION1 (single strong field), SUGGESTION2 not applicable, SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage=1.0), SUGGESTION4 applied (high userCount/alphaCount). Confidence set to 0.70 because short momentum is persistent but noisy.

results.idea: Mean-reversion: negative of 1-day return (overnight reversal)
results.description: Simple reversal using rsk62_1_return. SUGGESTION1 used one high-coverage field, SUGGESTION3 not needed, SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.55 — reversal exists but weaker.

results.idea: Volatility-adjusted momentum: 20-day return divided by 20-day volatility
results.description: Combines returns and volatility (rsk62_5_return and rsk62_risk_volatility). Applied SUGGESTION1 (two fields), SUGGESTION4 (both have high userCount). Confidence 0.72 — adjusts momentum by risk.

results.idea: Liquidity-weighted momentum: 10-day returns scaled by log(adv20)
results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_logadv20. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied; both fields high coverage. Confidence 0.65 — liquidity tilt reduces microstructure noise.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum: long stocks with rising EPS per share
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_backfill_spe (EPS). SUGGESTION1 single field, SUGGESTION3 used implicitly via backfill field (coverage ~0.965). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.64 — earnings revisions predict returns.

results.idea: Profitability quality: rank by net income per employee (nipe) growth
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_backfill_nipe. Applied SUGGESTION1 single high-quality field, SUGGESTION3 done (backfill provided). Confidence 0.68 — quality signals are persistent.

results.idea: Value: low PB (book-to-price) cross-sectional
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_pb (book value). SUGGESTION1 one high-coverage field, SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.60 — classic value effect.

results.idea: Current ratio mean-reversion: high current ratio reversal
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_curratio. SUGGESTION1 single field, SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.50 — liquidity ratios mixed performance.

results.idea: Industry-relative momentum: instrument 20-day returns minus industry 20-day avg
results.description: Combines rsk62_5_return and rsk62_industry_5_100_val?? (industry return). Applied SUGGESTION1 two fields, used high-coverage industry series. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.67 — captures idiosyncratic momentum.

results.idea: Beta-adjusted momentum: 10-day return minus industry beta times factor
results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_beta_5_100_logcap (beta on logcap). SUGGESTION1 applied; beta field coverage high. Confidence 0.66 — removes industry/factor exposure.

results.idea: Cross-sectional short-term zscore of 3-day returns
results.description: Uses rsk62_1_return. SUGGESTION1 single high-coverage field; cross-sectional zscore applied. Confidence 0.58 — captures relative recent moves.

results.idea: Momentum volatility breakout: high vol stocks with positive recent returns
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_volatility and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION1 applied two fields, SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62 — volatility sorted momentum.

results.idea: Yield capture: dividend date index momentum
results.description: Uses rsk62_dividend_di (dividend date index) and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION1 two fields; dividend_di has full coverage. Confidence 0.52 — capture known dividend-induced patterns.

results.idea: Size-adjusted reversal: small-cap stronger reversal
results.description: Uses rsk62_logcap and rsk62_1_return. SUGGESTION1 applied; logcap has good userCount. Confidence 0.6 — small caps exhibit stronger mean reversion.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by idiosyncratic risk (specific risk)
results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_1_100_ksrs. SUGGESTION1 applied; specific risk coverage high. Confidence 0.69 — favors momentum where idiosyncratic risk low.

results.idea: Earnings-growth tilt: long stocks with accelerating EPS growth
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_backfill_growth. SUGGESTION1 single backfilled field (coverage ~0.967). SUGGESTION3 satisfied. Confidence 0.63 — growth acceleration predictive.

results.idea: Gross-margin momentum: firms with improving gross margin
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_backfill_margin. SUGGESTION1 applied; backfill coverage high. Confidence 0.61 — margin improvements often positive.

results.idea: PB momentum: momentum among low PB stocks
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_pb and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION1 two fields; PB has high userCount. Confidence 0.58 — blend of value and momentum.

results.idea: Short-term reversal weighted by logadv20
results.description: Uses rsk62_1_return and rsk62_logadv20. SUGGESTION1 applied; both high coverage. Confidence 0.6 — liquidity-weighted reversal reduces noise.

results.idea: Beta differential: long low-beta, short high-beta within industry
results.description: Uses rsk62_beta_1_100_volatility and rsk62_beta_1_100_logcap. SUGGESTION1 two beta fields; coverage=1.0. Confidence 0.62 — beta-neutralization strategy.

results.idea: Cross-factor divergence: long dividend-sensitive factors, short margin-sensitive
results.description: Uses rsk62_beta_factor_1_100_dividend and rsk62_beta_factor_1_100_margin. SUGGESTION1 applied two factor betas. Confidence 0.54 — factor divergence can mean revert.

results.idea: Long-term momentum: 250-day returns z-scored
results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION1 single robust field. Confidence 0.66 — long-run momentum has established edge.

results.idea: Short interest proxy: low liquidity (low logadv20) mean-reversion
results.description: Uses rsk62_logadv20. SUGGESTION1 applied; liquidity proxy strong signal. Confidence 0.53 — proxy imperfect.

results.idea: Industry mean-reversion: industry 5-day return negative signal
results.description: Uses rsk62_industry_5_100_val70 (industry return). SUGGESTION1 single industry field, coverage high. Confidence 0.56 — industries mean-revert often.

results.idea: Volume-adjusted return persistence using logadv20 and 5-day return
results.description: Uses rsk62_logadv20 and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION1 applied; both high-quality. Confidence 0.61 — liquidity modulates persistence.

results.idea: Cross-sectional volatility zscore: prefer low-volatility stocks
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_volatility. SUGGESTION1 single high-coverage field, SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.57 — low vol premium.

results.idea: Momentum vs factor: correlation of stock returns with factor returns; choose low ts_corr
results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_factor_5_100_val24. SUGGESTION1 applied two fields, used ts_corr to find idiosyncratic momentum. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Turning points: days_from_last_change on factor exposures
results.description: Uses rsk62_beta_5_100_mtl (momentum beta). SUGGESTION2 not applicable; SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence 0.48 — exploratory.

results.idea: Relative value: PB scaled by logcap (cheap small caps)
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_pb and rsk62_logcap. SUGGESTION1 two fields, SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum decay filter: apply ts_decay_linear to 30-day returns
results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION1 single field; operator ts_decay_linear used to emphasize recent returns. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Cross-sectional zscore of earnings growth (backfilled)
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_backfill_growth. SUGGESTION3 applied (backfill field), SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum signal using factor return series (vec_avg of recent factor retseries)
results.description: Uses rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val4 (vector). Applied SUGGESTION2 (vec_avg) and SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.60.

results.description: Uses rsk62_1_return and rsk62_industry_1_100_val32. SUGGESTION1 two fields. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Quality spread: high margin minus low margin cross-section
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_margin. SUGGESTION1 single backfilled margin field (coverage ~0.9618). Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Earnings momentum vs factor: correlation between EPS change and factor returns
results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_backfill_spe and rsk62_factor_5_100_val24. SUGGESTION1 two fields. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorization: winsorize 20-day returns then zscore
results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION1 applied; winsorize to reduce outliers. Confidence 0.66.

results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return and hump to reduce turnover. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence 0.6.

results.description: Uses rsk62_risk_nipe (coverage high). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.description: Uses rsk62_beta_factor_1_100_dividend. SUGGESTION1 single beta field. Confidence 0.53.

results.description: Uses rsk62_beta_1_100_banks and rsk62_5_return. SUGGESTION1 two fields; applied to banks as example. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Long-term reversal: 250-day reversal z-scored

results.description: Uses rsk62_5_return and rsk62_5_100_intercept. SUGGESTION1 applied; intercept field has high userCount. Confidence 0.67.
